scripts.start:minecraft: docker-compose up --build minecraft-proxy minecraft-queue minecraft-main gatekeeper-redis
scripts.start:iam: docker-compose up --build gateway warehouse warehouse-migrate identity-web
scripts.migrate: (cd ./packages/warehouse && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://doceazedo:VERY-SECURE-DATABASE-PASSWORD@localhost:5432/whdb?schema=public npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma generate)
